channel.title: Dementhium lit up interfacebuttons
channel.description:
Hello,
i got a problem with Dementhium Source, sometimes when i logg in it fails to load the interface at this moment every player who logg in get the same problem, the only way to fix it is to restart the server (not client). But it happens again later....
here is a image of the bug: [img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/20pxz0h.jpg[/img]
the symbols are lit up and can't be clicked.
The second problem is, when i play the game on directX it doesnt show armoures/weps.
Best thanks!
